column4: Not one all-inclusive app as far as I'm aware, but there are seprate programs; iwconfig for txpower, cpufreq-set for speed...
I'd recommend to you the search feature in Synaptic. Surprising what you can find in the Ubuntu software repositories. Dead easy to install - and remove if it's not to your liking.
It's akin to Add/Remove Programs in Win, but much more powerfull/usefull.
You can spend a few days poking around in Synaptic...
